q_en: Which customer orders are the cutting tasks that the Advanced Cutting Group has not yet completed?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group with the name "Advanced Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '6' AND status != 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs for cutting tasks assigned to "Advanced Cutters" that are not yet completed

steps.sql: SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_name FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE o.id IN ();
steps.description: Retrieve the customer names and order names for the orders obtained in Step3
steps.results: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ')' at line 1")
